website_summaries.verdict: Various prompt modes so pagers can always be seen and heard to avoid delays and miscommunication. Reasonable price for reliable system with advanced RF technology.
pros: 16-piece pager set that can transmit to 350' indoors and 3,080' in open air
Sturdy charging base with deeper slots that prevent pagers from falling out
Simple programming for the base and user-friendly setup
cons: Reports of charging base heating up and issues with end-of-range use, even in open spaces

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful vibration alerting method in silence scenerio
customer_reviews.text: Out team has purchased the first set of paging system one month ago and used it as the alert tool in child study room. It's a wonderful product that could make the alert method to be vibration and flashing only, so we could make it work in quite studying area. We also order the 2nd unit for adult study area use. It got a wonderful range, with strong signal attached. Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: pattern

customer_reviews.title: Received faulty pager system
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this pager system. First the screen on the base that displays the number is faulty. Which I was willing to overlook as long as the pagers worked fine. Then I leave the pagers to charge for 7+ hours and 7 out of the 16 pagers are working.... I must have gotten the bad one out the bunch, but this is too much. We were looking forward to using this to help with social distancing. So very sad :(
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Jung

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: No one to call, pagers broke in one week time!
customer_reviews.author: Paul A Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Nine extra buzzers sitting around not working it is very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: The item is currently being used in my barbershop. The problem I have is that out of 16 buzzers, only seven of them work now. I don’t know what I’m doing wrong. I tried to read the instructions but they are hard to follow exactly. The downside also is that sometimes the clients leave without returning them and we’ve lost two of the seven that was working. So now that I have 9 extra buzzers sitting around not working it is very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: BLK

customer_reviews.title: strong vibration
customer_reviews.text: this is the third paging system I have.The previous are good too,but I gotta say this one is better.The vibration is very useful for a quiet area because the sound can be very noisy.Instead,strong vibration is a perfect subtitution.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers Brigid

customer_reviews.title: garbage !

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! I highly recommend for any church or organization.

customer_reviews.title: Good transaction & product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This paging unit works great. Receivers are compact, comfortable to carry and can be triggered remotely from our church nursery to our anywhere in our sanctuary (at least 50 to 100 feet away). Very quick and easy to setup and use out of the box. One receiver arrived cracked and with a dead battery. The seller quickly responded and fixed this by sending a replacement receiver.

product_meta.title: PagingPro Restaurant Pager System with Wireless Queue Calling System for Food Court Church Clinic (One Set 24)
product_meta.description:
Size:One Set 24

No more waiting in line:

Just easy to do the business with this calling system! Customers come to the restaurant and make an order will get a receiver with corresponding number from the waiter. When the order is ready, the waiter at the counter will press the number on the keyboard. The corresponding guest gets the wireless signal by his pager vibrating or LED flashing or sounding, then he knows order is ready and goes to the counter to take his food.

 


How to add more receivers:

Step 1 : Insert the receiver into charging slot, long press the [power] key for 3 seconds, three red LED light will be keep on mean enter registration state.

Step 2 : Press the keyboard corresponding to the number, then press the [CALL] key, receiver buzzer two times mean registration success, short press [power] return to standby state. Features 24 charging slot Receiver power indicator, low-battery alert. The host password protection to prevent error Settings Super receiving sensitivity Self testing while power on. One key call all receivers. One-key turn on/off Charge without heat Keyboard call host.

Working frequency : 433.92 MHz

Supply voltage :Input :AC 100-240 V Output :DC 5 V/5 A

Standby current : 10 m A

Transmit current :100±30 m A

Size : 9.2*6.2*1.3 for Receiver Working frequency : 433.92MHz

Supply voltage :DC3.7V (Rechargeable battery)

Charge voltage :DC5V

Standby current :<15mA

Working current :<100MA

Receive sensitivity :-110±2dBmv

Size:4.1*2.0*0.4 in Package of 1 x Keyboard call host 24 x Pagers 1 x Power Adaptor 1 x User manual
feature_bullets: [Applications] 4S store, book store, hospital, bank, factory, shopping mall, recreation center, restaurant, café shop, food court, clinic, church, auto shop, test center or other queue occasions.
[Rechargeable battery] Built-in external antenna on keypad and 16 batteries charging slots for pagers. Every pager has its own built-in rechargeable battery. Battery life depend on use frequency.

[Various prompt notice modes] Vibration + LED flashing; Buzzer + LED flashing; Vibration + Buzzer + LED flashing. (User can switch the mode you like.) When the waiter calls the number, the corresponding pager will vibrate or sound with LED flashing to remind the customer to get their food.

[Wireless paging system] Includes 16pcs coaster pagers for customers and 1-999 channel keyboard for waiter. You could add up to 999 pagers at most. Then no worry about not enough pagers when your business increasing.

[Advanced RF wireless technology] 433.92MHz radio frequency is more stable to transmit between pagers and keypad which is hardly disturbed by other radio signals. Transmission distance is 165-330 ft indoors, 3080ft in the open air.
